long_description: The WeedWing legend returns. The world's first buzzbait has a flat, high riding metal body powered by a churning, sonic propeller head. Great alone or add a pork strip. The weedless drives bass crazy. Definitely one for the tackle box. Heavy weighted body casts Accurately 70-90 ft.
